title: ManualPanelConfig
helperText: Use the manual workspace below to select cards, adjust players, and review live analysis without leaving the main window.
tips: Click cards in the grid to assign hole cards and board streets.
Adjust stacks, blinds, and active seats from the control panel.
Use ANALYZE HAND to refresh insights inside the workspace.
